sentences.en: Are they still lamenting for their homeland?
sentences.cn: 他们还在为自己的故乡悲哀 吗 ?

sentences.en: Firstly, you must be loyal to your homeland.
sentences.cn: 首先, 你必须忠于你的祖国.

sentences.en: He returned to his homeland with the purpose of serving his own people.
sentences.cn: 他返回祖国,意在为祖国人民服务.

sentences.en: He was banished ( from his homeland ) for life.
sentences.cn: 他被终生流放 ( 他乡 ).

sentences.en: He was forced to leave his homeland for political reasons.
sentences.cn: 因为政治原因他被迫离开自己的祖国.

sentences.en: I carry memories of my homeland around with me.
sentences.cn: 对家乡的回忆终日萦绕在我的脑际.

sentences.en: I had a longing for a homeland for my soul.
sentences.cn: 我渴望着我心灵上的归宿.

sentences.en: I would adore to settle back homeland.
sentences.cn: 我非常喜欢回家乡定居.

sentences.en: Many are planning to return to their homeland.
sentences.cn: 很多人正计划回到自己的祖国去。

sentences.en: Many refugees have been forced to flee their homeland.
sentences.cn: 很多难民被迫逃离了祖国。

sentences.en: Our homeland, the lives of our wives and children are at stake.
sentences.cn: 我们的国土家园, 我们的妻室儿女的生命,都在危急中.

sentences.en: The entire country rose up and drove the Austrian soldiers from their homeland.
sentences.cn: 全国人民奋起反抗,把奥军从他们的国土上驱逐出去.

sentences.en: The exiles had been cut off from all contact with their homeland.
sentences.cn: 流亡者被切断了与家乡的所有联系。

sentences.en: The Pope has sent a message appealing for unity in his homeland, against a background of divisions in the Solidarity movement.
sentences.cn: 团结运动中各派搞分裂，在此情况下教皇发出号召，呼吁祖国保持团结。

sentences.en: They had a deep yearning for their homeland.

trans.tran_cn: 祖国，家乡，（南非种族隔离制度下的）黑人住宅区
trans.tran_en: the country where someone was born
